title: FANTASTIC Location, Modern Finishes!
posting_body: Welcome home to this casual yet elegant, vibrant yet relaxed apartment community!
You will love the perfect blend of trendy and charming.
You are sure to find this to be the right space that’s perfectly suited to your personality!
GE Energy Star front load full-size washer and dryer
Stunning kitchen with 42” custom cabinets featuring luna pearl granite countertops, under-mount sink, & designer ceramic tile backsplash
Spacious en-suite master bath with luna pearl granite countertops, modern tile bath, & shower surrounds
Call today to schedule your free tour!
I have access to over 1000 apartment listing in all areas in and around the beautiful Austin, Texas!
Should this listing not fit exactly what you are looking for, I am happy to help you find your next home!
